item.title: Teleblock on command.equalsIgnoreCase
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“kqtrip”))

			if(!teleblock)                
            		{
                			teleportToX = 3304;
                			teleportToY = 3115;
				heightLevel = 0;
				sendMessage("The Kalphite Queen is expecting you..");
            		}
           			else if(teleblock)
            		{
               		 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
            		}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("range"))
 	
			if(!teleblock)                
            		{
                			teleportToX = 2677;
                			teleportToY = 3424;
				heightLevel = 0;
				sendMessage("Welcome to the ranged guild.");
            		}
           			else if(teleblock)
            		{
               		 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
            		}[/code]

why this doesn’t work? :s
i don’t understand why it doesn’t works[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 08:52:44 AM[/size][hr]anyone?
